original: [LEVEL 3] | FALL BACK! |

original: [LEVEL 3] | Stick to the Door and defend for another 10 seconds. |

original: [LEVEL 3] | Turn on your flashlights because it can be scary, hold on for 10 seconds. |

original: [LEVEL 3] | Go to the CHIEF CONSTABLE for 5 seconds. |
zh_trans: [第三关] | 去见警察总监5秒钟. |

original: [LEVEL 3] | 20 Seconds Strong Defend. |
zh_trans: [第三关] | 防守20秒. |

original: [LEVEL 3] | The zombies have teleported away, go back and use the upper stairs. |
zh_trans: [第三关] | 僵尸已经传送走了，撤退并上楼. |

original: [LEVEL 4] | Zombies COMING from WC. |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 僵尸从厕所来了. |

original: [LEVEL 4] | Defend the report room for 20 seconds. |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 防守报告室20秒. |

original: [LEVEL 4] | FALL BACK! |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 撤退! |

original: [LEVEL 4] | Without touching the fire, continue from the boss room, there is no stopping. |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 不要碰到火，前往警察局长的办公室，不要停下来. |

original: [LEVEL 4] | The door will open soon. |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 门很快打开. |

original: [LEVEL 1] | Go to the Police car park next to the Police Station. |
zh_trans: [第一关] | 前往警局旁的停车场. |

original: [LEVEL 1] | Enter the Police Lower Tunnel Car Park. |
zh_trans: [第一关] | 进入地下停车场. |

original: [LEVEL 1] | FALL BACK! |
zh_trans: [第一关] | 撤退！ |

original: [LEVEL 1] | Defend at door 2 for another 10 seconds. |
zh_trans: [第一关] | 防守第二扇门10秒钟. |

original: [LEVEL 2] | Enter through the window on the 3 wooden boxes on the left (for zombies). |
zh_trans: [第二关] | 僵尸从左边三个木箱子进入窗户. |

original: [LEVEL 2] | Go to the STAFF ROOM, door will open in 20 seconds.
zh_trans: [第二关] | 去员工间，门在20秒后开启.

original: [LEVEL 2] | FALL BACK! |
zh_trans: [第二关] | 撤退！ |

original: [LEVEL 2] | Prepare to Enter the Secret Library Room. |
zh_trans: [第二关] | 准备进入秘密图书馆. |

original: [LEVEL 3] | Turn right and defend for another 20 seconds. |
zh_trans: [第三关] | 右转并防守20秒. |

original: [LEVEL 4] | Go to the QUESTIONING. Zombies Teleporting in SECRETARY Room. |
zh_trans: [第四关] | 前往审讯室. 僵尸将传送至秘书办公室. |

original: [LEVEL 5] | 20 Second Defend in room. |

original: [LEVEL 5] | FALL BACK! |
zh_trans: [第五关] | 撤退！ |

original: [LEVEL 5] |+10 Seconds. :ujel: |
